Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points. Subtract 1 from the cost of all Artifact cards in your hand.
114841020.baseFlair_: Just as there are seven vices among mortals, there are seven virtues among the gods. The personification of humility seated on her heavenly throne calls out: "Psychomachia, in humility." Countless angels flock to the skies in response.
114841020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal X damage to a random enemy follower.
If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
114841020.evoFlair_: The seven virtues each rout one of the seven sins. Seeing greed fester in the earth below, a gentle voice calls out: "Mortals shall learn to be content." Countless angels descend to ensure that the statement becomes reality.

117841020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give a follower in your hand Fanfare - Recover 2 play points.
117841020.baseFlair_: It appears this dimension has yet to understand what control is. Without a strong leader, this plane will eventually wither and die. Then I will take control myself and birth a new generation devoted to obedience and fealty.
117841020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
117841020.evoFlair_: After traversing many dimensions, I've arrived at the conclusion that tyrants invariably bring about society's end. This world will extol my generosity. Control should not be constricting like chains but delicate like thread.

118841030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, evolve this follower and recover 2 play points.
118841030.baseFlair_: The people have chosen to open the floodgates of discovery, turning their backs away from this paradise. I must deter them from this foolishness and see that they have a change of heart.
118841030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118841030.evoFlair_: Only despair lies beyond the locked door. Though many wish to pass through, the scales of balance will not suffer a new world. Those intent on pursuing this path should ready themselves for condemnation by my hand.

900841060.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Marionette//Uno to become Marionette//Tre.
900841060.baseFlair_: Sadness. Next the girl learned sadness when she saw the inequality that plagues the world of men. "How come there are people who can't be saved!"
900841060.evoFlair_: Sadness. The girl's heart ached to learn that the human world is controlled by laws. "These people will be miserable forever."

900841170.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Last Words: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
900841170.baseFlair_: Yap all you want; chase after your golden tomorrows... You aren't getting past this!
900841170.evoFlair_: A tentacle forged of 100% cold steel. It mocks Mother Earth by boring into Her crust, spreading roots as if to mimic the flora of Her grand creation. She resists its chill, but there is no bond it cannot sever.

900841180.baseEffect_:
Storm.
If this follower can be targeted by enemy effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
900841180.baseFlair_: Bleurgh. Don't look at me like that—you'll infect me with your hope-cooties. You know what? You, your meager futures... I'm crushing them all!
900841180.evoFlair_: A tentacle forged of 100% cruel steel. It smites Mother Earth by darting over Her face, spreading calamity as if to mimic the fauna of Her grand creation. She resists its spite, but there is no love it cannot rend.

112814010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less, then summon an allied copy of that follower.
If Resonance is active for you, put a Puppet into your hand.
112814010.baseFlair_: If you see the strings of a puppet, it's because its master no longer saw fit to hide them.

100824010.baseEffect_:
Put 3 Puppets into your hand.
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
100824010.baseFlair_: I thought I'd make you a puppet of my own, but you seem to resist the idea. Do you value your freedom so much? Very well then—I suppose I'll have your life instead.

111824010.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards into your hand instead.
111824010.baseFlair_: A great rift tore the sky open, revealing another sky beyond it. —A farmer's memoirs

116824010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Puppet. Then destroy X random enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Puppets in play.
Destroy all allied Puppets.
116824010.baseFlair_: Even a puppet needs to cut loose.

110834010.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the cost of that card.
110834010.baseFlair_: Keep your eyes on your idol, everybody! Show me how much you love me! Show me how much you worship me!

116834010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Yuwan's Fury or Belphomet's Crackdown.
If Resonance is active for you, instead summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact, and randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Tisiphone, the Malignant
-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
116834010.baseFlair_: The soldiers have gathered their courage; they are now ready to war against fate. A single voice rings out like a shot over the silent ranks. "The time has come to take up arms. Come, let us carve a path to the future!" The rebellion has begun.

900834040.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+4 to an allied follower.
If that follower is Shin, Lawful Light, transform it into Shin, Chaotic Darkness.
900834040.baseFlair_:
Well, now that you've seen me, let's make a new world order. Yes, I will plunge this world into darkness.
—Shin, Chaotic Darkness

108822010.baseEffect_: Whenever an artifact follower that originally costs at least 3 play points comes into play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader instead.
108822010.baseFlair_: From progress comes innovation, and from innovation comes progress.

107811040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
107811040.baseFlair_: Swords? Totally barbaric. It's all about firepower, baby!
107811040.evoFlair_: Bringing a sword to a gun fight? Ha! I'd like to see you try, buddy.

107811120.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
107811120.baseFlair_: Incomplete, insufficient, imperfect and abandoned by its master. But despite everything, it lives.
107811120.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107811120.evoFlair_: Reduced to nothing and recreated from nothing. The mask effectively conceals a steady stream of tears.

109811030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Gilgamesh into your hand if Resonance is active for you.
109811030.baseFlair_: The oblivious beast of clay is no more. Through the wisdom of Shamhat, I have awakened and carry this name. Together with the hero, I'll take on this world once again.
109811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109811030.evoFlair_: Gugalanna, lords of the stars, what have you, it matters not. Those who bear their fangs to my dearest will be slain—even gods. For my one dear friend, I'll risk it all.

111811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then summon an Analyzing Artifact.
111811020.baseFlair_: Yesss! Destroy, destroy, destroy! But if we diiid decide to keep something after all has been smashed to bits, perhaps it may be an idol... A beacon for the world, crafted by my very own hands.
111811020.evoFlair_: Follow her into the deepest of shadows. To recreate the idol of destruction herself is to earn the authority to destroy—and within the shadow of destruction lies creation.

120811020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Ancient Artifact and Analyzing Artifact. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Enhance (9): Summon 2 Ancient Artifacts and 2 Analyzing Artifacts and put 2 Paradigm Shifts into your hand instead.
120811020.baseFlair_: I'm not going to wait around for the R&D budget to get approved! If you want to get things done, you've got to actively reach out to patrons and sponsors!
120811020.evoFlair_: I can practically see the smiles on the kids' faces once they get their hands on my creations! That's right! I've got plenty of dreams, and I'll grasp them all with these hands of mine!

900811040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
900811040.baseFlair_: Forged potential of ivory—a guide to the proper way, simply a matter of course.
900811040.evoFlair_: Chaotic potential of obsidian—the proper way is but only one, for infinite opportunities exist.

900811080.baseFlair_: This device is a barrier. It wards its master from obliteration... by first obliterating the would-be destroyer.
900811080.evoFlair_: This device is a barrier, secure until the bitter end. Its every nut, bolt, and feature was designed to protect. It doesn't fear destruction because it exists for one reason: to serve its master.

900811090.baseFlair_: This device is meant to reap. And there is nothing it can't harvest.
900811090.evoFlair_: This device is meant to steal life away. It was perfectly designed by its master to do so.

900811100.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
900811100.baseFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Revert reason, bring chaos to order.
900811100.evoFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Before you, all reason and all existence crumbles into chaos.

107821090.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
107821090.baseFlair_: In our experiments, we paired a human's body with a demon's blood. Using the organs of a beast, and a heart of black iron, we created something unspeakable, unidentifiable.
107821090.evoFlair_: Not human, demon, nor beast. It swelled as if it were water, and moaned in agony. We created something truly horrifying that day—an abomination without purpose.

107821100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +0/+1 and Ward to all Puppets in your hand.
107821100.baseFlair_: Comparable to a spider, the doll quickly latches onto any unfortunate soul entangled in its intricately woven threads.
107821100.evoFlair_: Its entangled threads stained with drops of vermillion, the true nature of the doll is revealed as it greedily devours its prey.

108821020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
108821020.baseFlair_: Talking's... something I'm pretty bad at. That's why this thing... does the talking for me. My new arm...
108821020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108821020.evoFlair_: Talking's not... what I do well. I think I'll come in handy too. Let's battle together... I'll do everything I can.

109821020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Go, Go, Robomi!
Enhance (8): Subtract 3 from that amulet's Countdown.
109821020.baseFlair_: So your name's Robomi, huh? It's amazing that an eons-old machina soldier can move and talk. I'm Nicholas, and I'll be taking care of your maintenance from now on, Robomi!
109821020.evoFlair_: The same technology used to create Robomi... I'll use it to protect the ones I love! Gigante Suit ready! Nicholas, lifting off!

900821030.baseFlair_: This unit's name is Robomi. You have been registered as this unit's new engineer, Nicholas.
900821030.evoFlair_: Charging complete. Preparing Hyper Megaton Kick.

107831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
107831020.baseFlair_: Entirety set right. Naught set to its counter. Now, you too must step upon the scales.
107831020.evoFlair_: Bear the burden of this world and the weight of mankind—achieve equilibrium and balance the heavens and earth.

116831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Machina or Natura follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush and the following effect: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
116831020.baseFlair_:
Concept: Automated artillery barrage
Subjects: All organisms capable of conveying laser turrets
Mission: Development of creature that is weapon and carrier in one
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Z
116831020.evoFlair_:
Organic life has donned steel, shouldered machinery, and assumed the robe of power. It roars, "We reign supreme; these machines are our attendants." This biological drive for dominance is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 2

117831010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, subtract 2 from its cost.
117831010.baseFlair_: I am the Two of Swords, exemplar of denial. The only path is forward. The only thing worth honing is skill. Nothing else matters. All these tools are at my disposal. No one will stand in my way.
117831010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117831010.evoFlair_: He is a master swordsman; his ideal state is stillness. To him, nothing need exist... Yet he realizes: he denies, therefore he is. Quickly, he turns his tools towards his own mind; he shreds away at his consciousness, hoping to one day return to his purest form.

119831030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Evolve an unevolved allied Puppet. Draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 3 Puppets.
Last Words: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
119831030.baseFlair_:
True power means never having to bow to anyone else's will. I created this puppet as a tool to help me achieve that kind of freedom... But then a thought occurred to me: can I even control this thing?
—Gripes of a Genius Puppet Crafter
119831030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119831030.evoFlair_:
Master says I'm big, and strong, and well made. Master says I can't be controlled by others. But I'm just a puppet... I can't do anything without somebody pulling my strings!
—Gripes of a Powerful Puppet

107841020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
107841020.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
107841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107841020.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

704841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
704841010.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
704841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
704841010.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

107841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.
-At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you, discard your hand and draw 6 cards.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
107841030.baseFlair_: Someone has to make sure fate stays in balance. I can restore order, or let chaos consume this world. Now then, which one will it be?
107841030.evoFlair_: Rotate the eternal wheel of fate, and the truth of the world reveals itself. Reach the limits of the world so that it may change forevermore. How far will you go?

111841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If the total cost of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match is at least 20, deal 5 damage instead.
111841010.baseFlair_: Look, life's not about following the pack, nor about creating a name for yourself. It's like this—when you get to be a certain age, you begin to see the right path. Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth. That's why you gotta fight only those that are ready for it.
111841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111841010.evoFlair_: Look, I don't plan to boast. The fact this sword chose me is just coincidence, you see. But even us older folk, we've got dreams. It doesn't embarrass me at all to say that's why I live my life rewarding virtue and punishing vice.

113841020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Puppets.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
113841020.baseFlair_:
Fear. Rage. Hatred. Affection—no, it's useless. I can't express all my heart feels for you. But I wonder... What do you make of me now?
—Orchis, Linked Heart
113841020.evoFlair_: From near and far, she sought a heart. The purpose of her creation. Her purpose in this world. Seeking the knowledge for herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

117841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Spinaria & Lucille, Keepers into your deck.
When an allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
117841030.baseFlair_: I'm not good at fighting, and it certainly isn't fun, but I made a promise to stick by you, Spinaria! I'll never abandon my big sister!
117841030.evoFlair_:
Lucille said I was important to her... My chest feels... warm. I think I'm happy.
—Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

117814010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower. Then deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the destroyed follower's attack.
117814010.baseFlair_: I hate attention. I get enough of that from doll aficionados.

109824010.baseEffect_:
Select 2 followers in play. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable followers are in play.)
109824010.baseFlair_: I'll transcribe your cries to my scores and use those tears to play my orchestra! Let the concerto begin...

107834010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107834010.baseFlair_: Somewhere within the vast, infinite reaches of this dimension, surely there's a place befitting you.

108834010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Lloyd the Android or Victoria. Put a Puppet into your hand.
Enhance (7): Give the summoned follower +0/+3 and Bane.
108834010.baseFlair_: "This is a fight for Orchis!" "If that's what you want, then it's what you'll get!" —Zwei and Orchis

109834010.baseEffect_:
Transform an Artifact card in your hand into an Artifact Spark.
Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
(Can be played only when a targetable Artifact card is in your hand.)
109834010.baseFlair_: Only through the perspective of man can nothingness be. Through the perspective of the universe, even nothing exists as something.

900844040.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Wretches.
If at least 20 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give them Storm.
900844040.baseFlair_: What is this pain which grips my chest? Is it anger? Confusion? Are... are you my prey? Why can't I remember?

100811050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
100811050.baseFlair_: My mission has only just begun—this flesh of iron will be your end!
100811050.evoFlair_: My mission continues—you will not survive, for I am black iron incarnate!

107811080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
107811080.baseFlair_: They ain't much to look at, but they're everything to me... You won't lay a hand on my crew—these arms are for protecting!
107811080.evoFlair_: What'd you say to me, punk? Never underestimate a pirate! Don't say I didn't warn ya—these arms are for fighting!

113811030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3.
113811030.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. We set out to create a prototype soldier— instead, a different beast was born. At times it takes the form of man. At others, a monster. We had no way of predicting it. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 001)
113811030.evoFlair_: With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of the "optimal figure" has changed. Whether a creation takes form as a skillful man or powerful beast, either one shall serve its purpose effortlessly. —Comparison of Mechanical Mammoth and Prototype Soldier

119811030.baseFlair_: Liking toys is fine; just don't get too attached to 'em. For those of us who fix toys, drawing that line helps us to maintain our professionalism. Well, look at you, Mr. Hoot-hoot! Now that we've fixed up your casing, you look like a brand-new bird!
119811030.evoFlair_: Don't get me wrong, you've gotta put some heart into it if you want to do a good job. But it won't do to get personally invested in every toy you meet. Aww, Mr. Hoot-hoot, it's almost time for us to say goodbye... Why's this gotta be so hard?!

109821010.baseFlair_: This... This must be the inner garden. Ahaha... I've arrived! To think all I needed to make it to the promised land was cross that pathetic barrier!
109821010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
109821010.evoFlair_: Now then, how should I start with this garden's destruction? Aha... I know just the trick. I'll thoroughly grind it to dust! Ahaha!

107831010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Evolve this follower and change its attack to X until the end of the turn. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed this match.
107831010.baseFlair_: A synthetic body, a synthetic life, a crossbreed. Neither human nor beast, what is my purpose in this life?
107831010.evoFlair_: What is my purpose in this life? I'll find my true purpose and make something of myself someday—just watch!

114831010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Cannon Hermit Crab and change its attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to half this follower's attack and defense, rounded up.
114831010.baseFlair_:
Concept: Waterproof and fully automated.
Subjects: Creatures already accustomed to armor.
Mission: Protect the peace without the need for human personnel.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team C
114831010.evoFlair_: The giant hermit crab peacekeeping experiment came to a most startling conclusion: the number of test subject crabs no longer matched up with the number of equipment sets produced. Further investigation will be required to find out why. For the good of all of us.

120831010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied follower. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, recover 2 play points.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower is destroyed, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
120831010.baseFlair_: Mankind's potential is worthless. That's why I've given up on it—so they can't use it against me. There's nothing anymore that I can trust. Not you, not even my own potential.
120831010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120831010.evoFlair_: I'm just an expendable tool. But if you think you can use me, you've got another thing coming. I'll break you before you even try. The only thing I can believe in is the fact that everything breaks.

110841030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck. Then put 10 Mystic Artifacts, 10 Radiant Artifacts, and 10 Prime Artifacts into your deck.
110841030.baseFlair_: After they were abandoned by their god, the sages began to dream. They would remake their philosophy, the laws of the world... the world itself. Thousands of forsaken souls united to give birth to a single mechanism. A single whole. A single... order.
110841030.evoFlair_: The new order burst from the old world's body, turned, and consumed it. One planet was not enough to sate its hunger; and so it devoured and grew. As it waxed in size and power, it knew it was no mere creation. It was the sum and the genesis of all the cosmos's principles.

112841030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all Machina cards from your deck. Put X Tisiphone, the Malignants, Y Alecto, the Dissonants, and Z Megaera, the Indignants into your deck. X, Y, and Z equal the number of Machina cards banished from your deck split randomly.
112841030.baseFlair_: What value is there in emotion? It's all just a dumb processing error. That's why I have to reclaim, reduce, and recycle them all—they're junk! Junk that I created! It hurts the pride to see your creations grow inefficient!
112841030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
112841030.evoFlair_: Stop laughing. Stop crying. And stop staring at me like that. You're going to make me vomit with those stupid expressions. You know what, forget it. It's termination for you. I'll wring the oxygen from your lungs, the tears from your ducts, and the life from your body!

113841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Lloyd the Android or Marionette//Uno.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
113841030.baseFlair_:
I was spiteful. I was jealous. I wanted to erase you—surpass you.
But... I don't know anymore. Are we even enemies? What are we? I... I wonder what to even make of you anymore.
—Zwei, Resonant Heart
113841030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Transform a Puppet in your hand into a Marionette//Tre.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
113841030.evoFlair_: From within her heart, she sought the answers. The folly of humanity. The righteousness of humanity. Seeking to witness them herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

116841030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Machina or Natura follower attacks, recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
116841030.baseFlair_: Its claws are state-of-the-art. They warp virtual mass and crush stars into dust. But to the great bear, even these ruinous weapons are but appendages. Fear not the blade—fear the flesh that wields it.
116841030.evoFlair_:
Activating Ometeotl: all systems online.
Code: FMD. OpticPilot, ready to go.
Inputting extermination sequence... Approved.
Things are about to get ugly.
—Ralmia, Sonic Racer

120841010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
----------
Fanfare: Choose - Summon 2 of the following cards. If at least 6 allied Artifact cards with different names have been destroyed this match, summon all 3 instead.
-Airstrike Artifact
-Keenedge Artifact
-Barrier Artifact
120841010.baseFlair_: Destroy them all, artifacts. There is no kindness to be found among the people here. I've been alone; I've always been alone. I'm done with this unkind world, and so my artifacts will break everything.
120841010.evoFlair_: I don't need happiness anymore. Why would I, when everybody's so cruel and the world is filled with sadness? I'll get rid of what I don't need, and what I do I'll destroy anyway! I want this world and everyone in it to leave my sight!

900841070.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Last Words: Summon a Marionette//Uno and a Marionette//Due.
900841070.baseFlair_: Hatred. Last the girl despaired at the world of men and began to hate. "If these people won't learn, if they're going to be miserable forever, then—"
900841070.evoFlair_: Hatred. The girl finally came to despise the world as unsavable. "If this is how the world is, then someone should crush it to pieces!"

110811020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
110811020.baseFlair_:
Did you hear about the statue our neighbors gave us?
"Targets identified. Changing to battle mode."
After it started movin', it crushed a lot of good men.
"Strengthening battle parameters."
110811020.evoFlair_:
No matter what we did, it kept fighting.
"Damage minimal. Continuing battle operations."
